text:
Report: Teams informed of Richards, Kings settlement theScore 6 hrs ago © Provided by theScore Teams were informed of the settlement breakdown between the Los Angeles Kings and Mike Richards this week, reports Sportsnet's Elliotte Friedman .
AdChoices Richards' contract will count against the Kings' salary cap for 17 seasons, through 2031-32.
Here's how Richards' settlement cap hits compare to a buyout had the #LAKings gone down that route instead. pic.twitter.com/wsHjHBjEAv
— General Fanager (@generalfanager) October 16, 2015 The Kings saved approximately $5 million by settling with Richards, as opposed to buying out his contract, according to The Globe and Mail's James Mirtle .
